info.brief_description: Erin suffers humiliating torture from her sister while their parents are on vacation.
info.description: 16 year old Erin and her 17 year old sister Gretchen have never gotten along. Gretchen is always bullying her sister, doing anything to embarrass her in public for no real reason. When their parents go out of town, leaving the sisters alone for two weeks, it gives Gretchen the opportunity to do even more to Erin with no one around to stop her.
